title: #28 Sargon of Akkad, Chael Sonnen, and Charleston Shooting
description: This week #GamerGate's Sargon of Akkad stops by to talk feminism and more. Friend of the show and UFC legend Chael Sonnen also swung by to talk 2016 elections and his new t-shirts. Also discussed; Charleston shooting, Donald Trump, and Carly Fiorina!
